response.overview: Available For The First Time In Nearly 50 Years  Transferred From The Original Half-Inch Four-Channel Masters  Blu-ray With 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic And Hi-Res Stereo Mixes  Rhino.com Exclusive  Quadraphonic sound, or 4.0 surround sound, utilizes four audio channels connected to four speakers positioned at the corners of a listening space. The multi-tracked audio is mixed dimensional, immersing the listener in an expansive soundscape.  BILLION DOLLAR BABIES saw Alice Cooper at the height of their power, mixing theatrical stage shows with hard-hitting rock anthems like "No More Mr. Nice Guy" and "Elected." The album went #1 on the U.S. Billboard 200 and the U.K. Album Chart and later earned a platinum certification.
response.title: Billion Dollar Babies -  Quadio
